Naruto.quote: I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word. That's my ninja way!
Hard work is worthless for those that don’t believe in themselves.
Those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
A person who can't acknowledge themselves will never be able to acknowledge others.
People live their lives bound by what they accept as true and real.

One Piece.quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future.
I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!
When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back.
When do you think people die? When they are forgotten.
I want to live — that's my map.

Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood.quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless.
Humankind cannot gain anything without first giving something in return.
No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
Fix what's broken and keep going.
Cherish the people you have, always.

Death Note.quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
I'll do anything for the people I care about.

Attack on Titan.quote: If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!
I'll put my life on the line to protect those I love.
The world is merciless, but it's also kind.
The only thing we're allowed to do is believe.

My Hero Academia.quote: I have to work harder than anyone else to catch up.
I'll become the number one hero.
I want to help people with a smile.

Hunter x Hunter.quote: I will find my own way and keep moving forward.
When I say it doesn't hurt me, that means I can bear it.
Vengeance is a heavy chain; be careful how you wield it.
I'll be a doctor who helps people. That's my promise.
A fight is only interesting when both sides want to win.

Cowboy Bebop.quote: We all carry our pasts; it's how we steer that matters.
I survive by my wits—and a little luck.
I see the world my way.

Steins;Gate.quote: Science isn't about giving up; it's about trying again.
I came back for a reason.
Being yourself matters more than fitting in.

Demon Slayer.quote: No matter how many people you lose, you must keep walking forward.
I fight with everything I have.

Neon Genesis Evangelion.quote: I exist to do what I am told.
I am not the type to give up.
I'll take whatever measures are necessary.

Code Geass.quote: If the king doesn't lead, who will?
I grant you a power you cannot refuse.
I'll change things from the inside.
I fight for what I believe in.
Obey me, and I will protect you.

Haikyuu!!.quote: We play together, we win together.
Support matters as much as skill.
I'll do my job, no excuses.

Bleach.quote: If I must fight to protect them, I will.
Maintain your dignity and stand firm.

Fairy Tail.quote: Strength protects those who cannot protect themselves.
I fight for my family—my guild.

Tokyo Ghoul.quote: I won't run from who I am.
We survive by protecting what matters.
There's more to being human than the body.
Masks hide truths, but also give faces.

Mob Psycho 100.quote: I don't want to hurt people.
Fake it till you make it.

Gintama.quote: Do it my way and take the hits.
I'll support you no matter what.

Dragon Ball Z.quote: I will become stronger and protect my friends.
I will fight for those I love.
